alert.note: Alert for Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 5:21PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EST... At 520 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Claysville, or near Avella, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail accumulation could lead to temporarily slick roadways. Locations impacted include... Washington, Wolfdale, McGovern, East Washington, Eighty Four, and Meadow Lands. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 17 and 18. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 37 and 43. && MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
